amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being available for the Friends of the Cheat Rails to Trails Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to limit the use of funds for the Friends of the Cheat Rails to Trails Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 342 (Roll no. 701).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
